website_summaries.verdict: A reasonable price with an attractive design make these shoes a great pick. They're also comfortable and fit well.
pros: Good arch support and room in the toe box
Foam foot bed makes them comfortable for all-day wear
cons: A snug fit is normal for this shoe, but doesn't work for everyone

customer_reviews.title: I rarely am successful and finding sneakers that are comfortable with my high arch
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for new sneakers for a while now. Although I have no issues finding shoes that fit, I rarely am successful and finding sneakers that are comfortable with my high arch. These pumas are amazing! They fit perfectly...I am a size 8 and ordered a size 8. They feel like I'm walking on air. I love that they're stylish and functional and aren't bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with these shoes. They are good for HIIT style workouts and weights, not meant to be a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I was a bit apprehensive about buying gym shoes online, but couldn’t resist the price at the time. They are great! I love the fit and the amount of cushion the sole provides. They’re great for HIIT classes, and I wear them to lift as well. I have a pretty high arch and they could use a bit more arch support for my taste, but I think for gym shoes they are probably pretty average as far as that is concerned. All in all, they are super comfy, give great support, look great, and I love wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up! Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love the shoe. However, buy a half size (or even a full size!) bigger than normal. I originally bought 8.5, which is standard for me. Way too snug. I replaced them with a 9, and even the 9 I feel is a little too snug. I had to take a star away for this because I feel that the sizing is way off of standard so it caused me a lot of back and forth. The shoe is really comfortable and I love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: NowhereStairs

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some shoes for cross training. These are not it. The day they are running shoes, but I would not run in these or recommend anyone run in them. The are overly stiff like 2 boards attached to your feet. They don't even work well for walking. The hurt the top of both my feet. I did go up a half size after reading reviews and could have probably gone up a whole size. These shoes are OK to wear for a little weight training, but I cannot leave them on for more than a couple of hours before my feet start hurting badly.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Hart

customer_reviews.title: Sweet kicks!
customer_reviews.text: These look way better in person. They are super comfy as well; especially in the toe region. It feels like I have pillows on my feet :) I can't wait to wear these to the gym tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Tiva

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfy, fit as expected and lately I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this shoe and they were all correct. These are super comfy, fit as expected and lately I keep hearing ... "PUMA has tennis shoes?" Sadly I remember when PUMA was all the rage and they quality of the shoe has not changed since the beginning of time. I love them, they look great and feel great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Crosstrainers
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I read tons of reviews and articles trying to find the perfect cross trainers (I didn’t want 15 shoes for each workout!) and these were on the top of many lists and they were a great price! Be wary though, almost all women’s pumas run small so be sure to get a half or full size up (I wear size 9, ordered a 10 and they fit great)
customer_reviews.author: SBee31

customer_reviews.title: Not For High Impact
customer_reviews.text: I kind of hate these shoes. I am a Jazzercise instructor and I need my shoe to provide stability for side to side movements, hopping, skipping, etc. They are too soft so my foot moves all around and the ankle support just isn't there. I think if I had done a size smaller it could have helped with that but they are still too soft for the movements that we do. I think if you were doing low impact aerobics or outdoor walking they would be fine. I did give it 3 starts because they look nice and the cushion on the bottom feels great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: BethJ

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the colors and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these shoes. I work in a pretty laid back dress code job, but these are the only shoes that come in colors that I am comfortable wearing to work and that don't look like I'm going to hike a mountain. Plus they're insanely comfortable! Order a half size up though. I had one pair that was my usual size and they were comfortable enough, but I ordered the next two a half size bigger and they are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted these. I had ordered a size up and they ended up being to small. I had only tried them on and stood up in them. I returned them to get an exchange in size but they only reimbursed half of what I paid and said that they were worn so they would not exchange or return the full amount I paid for them. That was very disappointing considering I only put them on and stood up. Didnt even take 2 steps in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and looks good too!
customer_reviews.text: My sister referred me to this brand and style for a walking shoe. I have had issues with other walking shoes as they do not offer the correct support for me. These fit perfectly and my first time with them I walked 3.5 miles with no issues whatsoever. They were really comfortable and felt like I had broken them in for months. This shoe gets very high marks from me (a very picky shoe buyer!!).
customer_reviews.author: Linda Straub

customer_reviews.title: Completely
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why this is so highly rated. There was very few who didn't like it, but strangely, I completely agree with them. The shoe ran small, and was not only narrow for the size but it didn't feel like there was any padding at the ball of the foot where it's most crucial for jumping activities, AND it was weird how there was no padding at all in the tip of the shoe. I have a high arch and I could tell immediately when trying it on, that it wasn't going to be good as the laces had just enough slack to tie a bow. Returned. Going back to ASICS
customer_reviews.author: Clairicito

customer_reviews.title: Wore out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I re-odered these shoes because I loved my first pair, but this second pair wore out in months, holes in the fabric, the sole is shredding just from putting the shoe on, and the bottom isn't even worn yet, they didn't last very long at all for being a real Luma product.... makes me think they were knock-off but they aren't, just made a cheap batch of shoes I guess the second time
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn Wright

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Puma sneakers. I am wearing these for boxing. They fit perfectly right out of the box, without needing a break in period. I normally wear a size 8 and the size 8 fit perfectly. I love the colors, feel and fit of this shoe. Very comfortable and supportive for me. I highly recommend. The last pair I bought are still in great shape, these are very well made sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes that hide dirt well
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes at work every day working in a busy medical office, walking a lot. I finally wore my last pair out after 2 years of heavy daily use. I like that the shoe is black and it hides dirt really well. Even after 2 years they still looked pretty nice. My only problem is that I somehow poked a hole in the fabric above my toe, but I continued to wear them for a long time as long as I had black socks to make it not as obvious. I like these shoes and I'm glad I decided to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten C

customer_reviews.title: up size.
customer_reviews.text: when I check "fits as expected" I mean I expected them to be small, from reading amazon reviews. and they are. I wear a sz 8. after scanning reviews, I bumped my order up to an 8.5. The 8.5 fit is snug too, surprisingly!, but doable. I am pleased I ordered the next size up. wore them today to my aerobics and strength class. I am super happy with their performance. they are light, supporting, and the right choice for cross-training. cool colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Clove

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like buying shoes online but I was happy with this purchase. The shoe came nicely packed and visually appealing. I love the colors of this show and they go with almost anything. I love the puma on the side! They are well made. I have ran in these shoes without any discomfort. I have worked 12 hours in these shoes and my feet do not hurt and they don’t loose their cushion. All in all it’s a comfortable versatile shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gill

customer_reviews.title: Very big size!!
customer_reviews.text: This was really big shoes not only from inside but the outlook too I wear 7 always but this one felt like 8 or 8.5 I can work with some extra space inside but it was huge for my foot outside. it looked ridiculous ! It's soo wide too I didn't like it at all I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: isham

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but worn quickly
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes, after the first long day of wearing them my feet were happy. They fit good but not loose and didn't bother my arthritic toes. I wore them as my main shoe for a couple months and a hole has already rubbed through at my big toe. The material is just not sturdy enough, still comfortable but I needed a shoe to hold up to daily use with a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Small town mom

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected..
customer_reviews.text: I bought my size. It fits but it doesn't stay on well for high intensity workouts. Much bulkier than expected. A little disappointed. Not a terrible shoe its comfortable. I would use it now as a casual/walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: meemeiu

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! Im a nurse and work 12 hour shifts, on my feet all day. I've tried all kinds of shoes. And every tennis shoe I have tried has ended the day with my feet tingling, until now! I didn't even have to get insoles for these shoes. Also, i get a lot of compliments on how cute they are.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I very recently got into running and needed a good pair of shoes. Yesterday these arrived and I can already tell they are my favorite by far! They have great support all over and are the perfect weight. Normally I wear a size 9.5 but I went with a 10 which was a smart choice because they are form fitting. Will definitely be buying a second pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow but still good
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes and even ordered my husband the closest ones in male we could find cause he loved them so much too. The only problem is with how narrow they are. I don't have wide feet but it is definetly hurting more than it should trying to break them in. Overall I know I'm going to be using these for a long time to come once they're broken in!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Crossfit shoe around....and a great price, to boot!
customer_reviews.text: Beats the heck out of the much more expensive Reebox crossfit shoe! These are a bargain at twice the price! Crossfitters, don't miss out on these sneakers because the price is cheap. They are EXCELLENT.
customer_reviews.author: anthony luke

customer_reviews.title: All in all good shoe and nice colors
customer_reviews.text: All in all good shoe and nice colors. Does not breathe as much as I would of liked, also the soles are very hard...I feel the description was a little misleading. Took a kickboxing class and had to kick off the shoes to finish the class. They were broken in at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Khione

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but wore down fast
customer_reviews.text: I wore them 3 times a week when I did HIIT workouts and sometimes when I walked long periods, and had to throw them out after a year. Ended up wearing down too fast and developed holes inside the shoe. Fit true to size but wear down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect and they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sister. She loves them. The fit is perfect and they are comfortable. She is able to move freely and exercise confidently without any risk of injury or pain from improper shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Eicher

customer_reviews.title: Ok not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe comfortable but I have only had these shoes a couple of months and it has a whole in the side of the shoe , I work i. A service department and I am always on my feet going . Was hoping to get at least 6mo this out of these but I will be needing another pair soo.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I totally love these sneakers, I will recommend them to anyone looking for comfortable light workout shoes. I'm using these for workout and running. I should mention that I gave 4 stars because I needed about 1/2 size more and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rea G.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, comfy shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter who is on her feet all day. They work great for her because she does not use an insert as the soft cushy foam insole is not removable. We love the look of them. I think they run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: elemtchr1

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and versatile. I go to a boxing/kickboxing gym and needed a shoe that could handle the abuse and still feel great to move around in. The shoes so far are handling everything I put them through. Would definitely recommend and will be purchasing again when the ones I own eventually retire.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Back slips a little, overall not bad
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these twice so far, but the backs seem to slip a little. I'm still breaking them in though. They seem to provide good support for my HIIT workouts and are lightweight. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, they look great. Unfortunately, the sizing is too small and narrow. They also have nearly zero cushioning, just not comfortable. They are supposed to be cross training shoes, but I can't imagine doing a variety of exercises with them, especially any jumping.
customer_reviews.author: amytee

customer_reviews.title: Good for circuit training but stretch out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy right away. Cushion is great for circuit training. Only problem that I have is there's poor forefoot support and my foot rolls out easily or stretches the lateral material of the shoe leading to decreased support.
customer_reviews.author: K. Woxland

customer_reviews.title: Puma makes cute styles as always, but this shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Puma makes cute styles as always, but this shoe is very roomy on top of the foot. In fact, I could have fit another foot on top of mine if I wanted to. Perhaps if you have wide feet this shoe may work but for a narrow, slender foot, forget it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Danielle Reese

customer_reviews.title: Memory Foam...more like memory is gone.
customer_reviews.text: Puma shoes were slightly too large but doable. However the memory foam apparently had a lack of “memory” because they killed my feet after two months of wearing them to work (I work in a bottle shop so not much wear and tear at all on the shoes).
customer_reviews.author: loulouambrosia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cross Training Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shows. I wear then for lifting and various forms a cardio and are very supportive and comfortable. I've also received a few compliments. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for narrow feet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haa hard time getting shoes for workouts that my feet don't slide around in, I have really narrow feet and after seeing reviews decided to try these, they stress perfect... if you have wide feet the will be too snug
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic looking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look like you're wearing plastic on the bottom. They fit well and look okay but not super impressed with them.
customer_reviews.author: ashley93_love

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more happy with these shoes. I have a slightly wide size 6 foot and these fit just perfectly. Comfortable, stylish, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zumba
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Zumba class, hoping they'd offer good impact support and shock absorption, and they certainly do. I used to end class with a lot of knee pain, but these sneakers have significantly decreased that. I usually wear size 9, but ordered a 9.5, and they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: The shoe itself looks really nice but was a little to big for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself looks really nice but was a little to big for me. Width and length wise. When I would try to run my heel would practically slip out. The quality is really nice. It didn't feel as if it would fall apart after a few uses. The soles had really good grip as well when on pavement and indoors. Also it is very light weight which was nice. I did ultimately end up returning the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for less intense workouts with less quick movements/pivoting of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for kickboxing and I ended up returning them because they felt very loose. My foot shifted a lot while wearing them and they didn't seem ideal for such an activity. Maybe good for less intense workouts with less quick movements/pivoting of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Propofol

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit and feel of these
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and feel of these. Much more cushion than expected. I love them. I hope during the wear and tear it upholds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they are fantastic shoes they last forever and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I only sat fits as expected because I own so many pairs of pumas, I normally wear a 8 1/2-9, in my opinion all pumas run small.... but they are fantastic shoes they last forever and are very comfortable, if I had the money I would buy 10 more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: brandi wylie

customer_reviews.title: Hot and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because the shoe bed is made of foam and it’s too hot. The shoe is overall pretty heavy compared to my other running shoes. Wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: K&B

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look great and are comfortable enough to walk in during the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for High intensity Zumba. My feet would hurt towards the end of each class. The shoes look great and are comfortable enough to walk in during the day but not for Zumba. They run small. I ordered 7 (am usually a 6.5) after reading reviews however, I still feel they are small even with a 7. Maybe because my feet have wide width. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Le

customer_reviews.title: Chin splints and callouses from these shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is in need of an insole support. After my first workout with shoes, I got chin splints. My feet were sore after each workout. Within a couple weeks, I had to purchase a different pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Noviello

customer_reviews.title: 3 month update. I wear these shoes to work ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 month update. I wear these shoes to work because I am on my feet all day, but both shoes now have holes in the top fabric. Would not purchase these again due to durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, minimal support.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, but they do not offer enough support for hard workouts. They mushed down after the very first Zumba session. They are very attractive though.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: For the price they're great. Been wearing them alot and am not disappointed. Dont expect to offer support or be a good training sneaker. They're good casual sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I still love them and they are extremely comfortable I just don't ...
customer_reviews.text: It is my own fault they were a little small. They were not small length-wise. I usually do not need to buy my shoes in wide but with these ones you can my little toes poking into the side. I still love them and they are extremely comfortable I just don't think I will have them very long before a hole starts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. They are Very comfortable. Good everyday shoe but also I have jogged in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Definitely runs small. I usually wear a 9.5 to 10, I ordered the 10. I should have ordered the 10.5 or 11.
customer_reviews.author: S.M. Kruse

customer_reviews.title: So light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers, I occasionally like to run outside and these sneakers are super light weight, if they get wet for any reason they dry super fast. I have bought 2 pairs in the past 8 years!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Feener

customer_reviews.title: My go to shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have lasted me almost 2 years now, im just now having to replace them, they are comfortable and look good with just about anything i wear (and i wear them a lot)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Super comfy. I fit anywhere between a 7.5 and 8 but don't like my gym shoes too loose. I got a 7.5 and they are a bit snug on the toes. If you don't like a tight fit I recommend going up a half size. Overall they were exactly what I was looking for and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the Puma brand
customer_reviews.text: I love the Puma brand! This is my first pair my feet especially my heels feel so much better when I walk in them. I will buy these again when I wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.text: love these sneakers. They arrived in 3 days and they are really nice. They seem made well. They fit true to size. very pleased I love the design of these.
customer_reviews.author: VivFaora

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a pair of Puma’s before now. Not pleased with these at all. Footbed in my shoes are terrible! I’m on the hunt for a better pair! Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Nana4

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this shoe and I'm pretty happy with my purchase so far. I purchased a different insole and it has worked great. Great support for my flat feet and weak ankles.
customer_reviews.author: A. Combatsueda

customer_reviews.title: I'm utterly disappointed with these shoes because not only are they uncomfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I'm a huge fan of puma and I never had a problem with their shoes except thus product. I'm utterly disappointed with these shoes because not only are they uncomfortable but my feet are also aching from wearing these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Yasuha

customer_reviews.title: True to size and so super comfy! They are worth the price
customer_reviews.text: True to size and so super comfy! They are worth the price. I am a full time personal trainer and comfortable, supportive cross training shoes are so important.
customer_reviews.author: Collegebooks987

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes offer so much support! I wear these on my lifting and balancing days!
customer_reviews.author: Holly M Engholm

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The size 9 doesn't feel like a size 9. More like an 8 1/2. Go at least a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Davis

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice shoe, but the sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice shoe, but the sizing is off. I’m a size 7, and this size 7 Puma sneaker was pretty much the size of an 8! I gave them to my friend who wears size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Love the flexible fit of the entire shoe. The thicker heel makes those 400M runs much easier. I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these shoes for a while and they are still in great shape. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, should've returned them, but I forgot until it was too late. Otherwise they look like good shoes though
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: second pair for my wife. first pair held for nearly two years of 3 time a week aerobics and trx classes. looks great, fit well and are as comfy as her previous pairs of some of the most expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Idan Chayun

customer_reviews.title: Not much under ball of foot!
customer_reviews.text: There is little to know padding under the ball of the foot. Too uncomfortable for me for a cross trainer.
customer_reviews.author: ASHBERRY

customer_reviews.title: comfortable while offering a feeling of good support.  They look good too.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable from first day on. I wore them all day the first day, forgetting I had on new shoes until I looked down as getting out of the car when getting home. They are also
customer_reviews.author: William C. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: 5-8 and ordered an 8 which is slightly too tight but I love the look so didn't have patience to send them ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5-8 and ordered an 8 which is slightly too tight but I love the look so didn't have patience to send them back and wait for a bigger size . I jut can't wear them often without my feet hurting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great indoor gym shoes. Not a running shoes. I ordered a 1/2 size up and it fit great and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best-Fitting Shoe I've Put on in a Long Time
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit and very comfortable. I found that they ran true to size; I wear a 10.5 (a hard-to-find size...nice to find them in this shoe) and that's what I ordered. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyAdornsVirtue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers bought for my wife she loved them last a long time quality outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Over all good shoe. However
customer_reviews.text: Over all good shoe. However, they are tighter than other shoes and also heavier than most shoes in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I stand all day so its important to me that the shoes I wear are able to last all day. These shoes are very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_addict

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes but didn't realize these shoes have a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes but didn't realize these shoes have a soft foam foot bed. I have worn them 1 day and received 3 positive comments on them!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Wear them to work and on my feet for 8-9 hours straight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have used them for running for about a month now, they feel awesome!!!! as long as you are awared they run a little small. Totally satisfied, would buy them again before they get discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: leona

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. But they don't breathe really well. I still love them, though. They fit a bit small, but they didn't have the next half size up in stock so I kept them. Not sorry at all that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love My Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes half a size small and was nervous, but I got them and they are PERFECT! SOOOOOO COMFORTABLE and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ryan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very nice for the price, they definitely fit as expected.. I wear a 7 in woman's, a bit tight feeling, but the material is comfortable, so it's not cutting around the toes or anything....
customer_reviews.author: misti allen

customer_reviews.title: Sole looks like it's about to come unglued around edges
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on this shoe, I ordered a size larger. Still too small. Toe is very flat and pushes down on the top of my foot even when unlaced. Very uncomfortable after an hour or two. Sole looks like it's about to come unglued around edges. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Too large. They felt almost about a half size too big. Also, there is not much padding and no arch support. The shoe was overall very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet pea

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes haven't wore them for much days. Won't know how they hold up. But I love the style and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yuleysie G.

customer_reviews.title: I love my pumas
customer_reviews.text: I love my pumas, but these ones fit tight,I usually buy speedcats but bought these to walk, they fit tight and when I walk my last 3 toes go numb?? I do t know I'm not impressed
customer_reviews.author: wendy68

customer_reviews.title: Loved these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have feet that are very fussy, this sneaker is perfect. I stand at school all day and these shoes are comfortable. I need added arch support and my inserts fit very well. Would order again and again:}
customer_reviews.author: Shelley L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Grest value
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Comfortable for all day wear and long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary A. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for me after searching a store and prices to high this was perfect for running
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: When the shoes got here I tried them on and they fit pretty well for being the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small. I originally wear an 8 but had to order half a size bigger due to the 8 being out of stock. When the shoes got here I tried them on and they fit pretty well for being the wrong size. Other than that I love the design.
customer_reviews.author: BMD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Super comfortable and soft on the inside perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear between an 8 and 8.5. Because these are being used for the gym I went bigger. These are great! Very comfortable for my workout. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Creamer

customer_reviews.title: I love my shoes
customer_reviews.text: I order this shoes, and they are perfect. They are comfortable. Before buying them i also read the reviews and that help me a lot. I am size 7 or 7/2 and i order an 8 ... they run a little smaller .. I love my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: L and B

customer_reviews.title: Sending them back.
customer_reviews.text: Sending them back. I do lots of HIIT and there is no support sideways, or support in the toe. Not sure why so high rated. Maybe be good for walk around the block, but that is it!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable shoes, the material that the body of the ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable shoes, the material that the body of the shoe is made of feels like you are wrapping your feet in memory foam. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They are a bit small but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are a bit small but I still wear them. They may be small but they are still comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Nakita Mason

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Giving it four stars because they're good quality but I'm really upset these don't fit me :(
customer_reviews.author: Faith

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Cell Riaze Heather Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description:
The cell riaze is a women's specific style utilizing our cell technology. Cushioning, comfort and style are what the cell riaze is all about.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Soft heathered textile with Bonded Synthetics
